mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.uid AS "uid", a.nick_name AS "nickName", a.openid AS "openid", a.gender AS "gender", a.province AS "province", a.city AS "city", a.country AS "country", a.headimgurl AS "headimgurl", a.privilege AS "privilege", a.is_subscribe AS "isSubscribe", a.subscribe_time AS "subscribeTime", a.language AS "language", a.union_id AS "unionId", a.remark AS "remark", a.group_id AS "groupId", a.login_time AS "loginTime"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wechat_log( id, uid, nick_name, openid, gender, province, city, country, headimgurl, privilege, is_subscribe, subscribe_time, language, union_id, remark, group_id, login_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{uid}, #{nickName}, #{openid}, #{gender}, #{province}, #{city}, #{country}, #{headimgurl}, #{privilege}, #{isSubscribe}, #{subscribeTime}, #{language}, #{unionId}, #{remark}, #{groupId}, #{loginTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wechat_log SET uid = #{uid}, nick_name = #{nickName}, openid = #{openid}, gender = #{gender}, province = #{province}, city = #{city}, country = #{country}, headimgurl = #{headimgurl}, privilege = #{privilege}, is_subscribe = #{isSubscribe}, subscribe_time = #{subscribeTime}, language = #{language}, union_id = #{unionId}, remark = #{remark}, group_id = #{groupId}, login_time = #{loginTime} WHERE id = #{id}
